title: Asian Stocks Set to Fall as 2026 Momentum Fades: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities look set to open lower Thursday after global shares and Treasury yields fell as traders digested mixed US economic data and a quickly shifting geopolitical backdrop.
content: Asian equities look set to open lower Thursday after global shares and Treasury yields fell as traders digested mixed US economic data and a quickly shifting geopolitical backdrop.
